Package org.joeftiger.jhelp

Class JavaHelp

java.lang.Object
org.joeftiger.jhelp.JavaHelp
public class JavaHelp
extends java.lang.Object
A help consists of a HelpUsage and multiple HelpOptions (created with the help of HelpOptionBuilder). It can be queried for getOptionByInvoke(String).
Version:
0.1
Author:
Julius Oeftiger

    • sortOptions

      public JavaHelp sortOptions​(boolean sort)
      Whether the sort the options alphabetically for toString().
      Parameters:
      sort - true to sort, false if not.
      Returns:
      this JavaHelp

    • hasOptionInvoke

      public boolean hasOptionInvoke​(java.lang.String input)
      Returns whether an option contains the given input invoke.
      Parameters:
      input - invoke to search for
      Returns:
      true if found. false if not.

    • getOptionByInvoke

      public HelpOption getOptionByInvoke​(java.lang.String input) throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
      Returns the option exactly matching the given input invoke. If no matching option is found, an exception will be raised.
      Parameters:
      input - invoke to search for
      Returns:
      matching option
      Throws:
      java.util.NoSuchElementException - if no option matches the given inp ut

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns this JavaHelp as a beautified String to print.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      printable representation

    • setOptionIndent

      public JavaHelp setOptionIndent​(int indent)
      Sets the indent for options. If the given indent is negative, it will be clamped to 0. The default is indent.
      Parameters:
      indent - new indent
      Returns:
      this JavaHelp

    • setDescriptionIndent

      public JavaHelp setDescriptionIndent​(int indent)
      Sets the indent for option descriptions. If the given indent is negative, it will be clamped to 0. The default is descriptionIndent.
      Parameters:
      indent - new description indent
      Returns:
      this JavaHelp

    • setParagraphLimit

      public JavaHelp setParagraphLimit​(int limit)
      Sets the limit for description paragraphs. Will be clamped to (descriptionIndent + 10) if below. The default is paragraphLimit.
      Parameters:
      limit - new paragraph limit
      Returns:
      this JavaHelp
